text: ēṟṟumuṭṭunnat eviṭeveccāyāluṁ niṅṅaḷavare ‎vadhikkuka. avar niṅṅaḷe puṟattākkiyiṭattuninn ‎niṅṅaḷavareyuṁ puṟantaḷḷuka. mardanaṁ keālayekkāḷ ‎bhīkaramāṇ. masjidul haṟāminaṭuttuvecc avar ‎niṅṅaḷēāṭēṟṟumuṭṭunnilleṅkil aviṭe vecc niṅṅaḷ ‎avarēāṭ yud'dhaṁ ceyyarut. athavā, avar niṅṅaḷēāṭu ‎yud'dhaṁ ceyyukayāṇeṅkil niṅṅaḷavare vadhikkuka. ‎atāṇ attaraṁ satyaniṣēdhikaḷkkuḷḷa pratiphalaṁ. ‎
